channel.title: Heavenly-Reborn! 562 Loading 688 ! 24/7 Online! Great features!
channel.description:
[b][u]Welcome to Heavenly-Reborn! 562 loading 688[/u][/b]
[i][u]Links:[/u][/i] [url=http://www.heavenly-reborn.tk]www.heavenly-reborn.tk[/url]
[u]INFO[/u] ~ Holiday event (easter) ~ Each level up gives you +5 server points (server points cannot be spent, they're only for your player rank via ::myrank) ~ Max cape added ~ Completionist cape added ~ Skills go to 126 (now it says 126/126 instead of 126/99) ~ Summoning pet now stays with you if you log out (no more pets disappearing) + Now you can't pick up other people's pets
~ Rune essence mine, and teleport ~ Quick firemaking cube (click on it, and it takes all your logs and converts them to experience) + Different logs have different experience
~ New bows available from the vote shop (fastest bows in game) ~ New boss, 'Grecoloco' about 1,600 hit points, different types of attacks ~ Fixed some experience rates ~ Barrows fixed (no more glitched rewards, and you can access the chest after you kill all brothers) ~ Primal weapons (all) animations fixed, no longer punches ~ Chaotic Rapier animation fixed ~ x10 hits fixed ~ Slayer minigame ~ Beacon shop (actual shop now, click the chest beside the beacon to spend your points)
~ Made ::myrank command now give you a title depending on your rank ~ Made main dialogues not skip into other dialogues ~Time Counter, now instead of game seconds, it tells you how many hours, minutes, days.. etc. That you've played. ~ ::bank command for anyone above 1,200 total level (or any level if you're member)
~ Nice welcome screen ~ Play time, you play for a certain amount of time (10 hours) in total, you can buy a veteran cape by talking to "Skrillaphat" at home. ~ Max cape added ~ Completionist cape added ~ Yell titles change depending on your total level
~ ::afk command now works, you stay fully afk until you type ::back (admins have their chair change every 10 seconds ) ~ Dicing added ~ You can buy member points from the member shop (5 points for 50m, 50 points for 500m) ~ Members have exp boosts (depending on their rank, more explained in the [Membership] section)
~ Skillcape masters to give capes ~ Loadstone network
~ Made new tutorial island (prison break) ~ Hint arrows added ~ Tutorial island now has hint arrows that tell you where to go ^_^ ~ New food in game; 'Cheeze burger 100%' heals 70 (x10; 700) health.
~ New bone in game, 'Greco's bones' burry it for 100,000 prayer experience, only obtainable from 'Grecoloco' boss
~ Dungeoneering ring no longer allows you to teleport if you're tele blocked
~ Some admin commands fixed ~ Made greco drop torva at a low rate ~ Made greco drop clue scrolls ~ Players can't cheat wear 1000 the member items [Minigames] + (Beacon minigame, credits to UnitedPK 525(Kennelz's server) for the idea) + All logs work + Point shop made, instead of it automatically giving you + Click the beacon in edgeville to learn how the game works
+ (Slayer minigame) + 2 floors + Prestige Experience multiplier fixed + Removed the timer floor due to bugs
+ (Barrows) + Kill those crackers in purple for rewards. + Rewards fixed
+ (Garden minigame) + No more glitching the plant from outside the gate + Collect seeds and spend em on the fountain shop for great experience in farming + 4 areas, all working and depend on level to work + The higher the level, the better the seed
Regular Training Spot [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/prfORlW.jpg?1[/img] Fully working Completionist Cape! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/MeoMPpt.jpg?1[/img] New System, ::myrank ! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6EuUdEZ.png?1[/img] Slayer system! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bwtYERS.png?1[/img] Staffzone! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/GZUMNiz.png?1[/img]

@D4L3B1997 wrote:

Very very good server, all the staff welcome you with open arms and are always there if you need them, they are very helpful if you need some help or some tips on the game, there is alot of stuff todo on the server so trust me you wont get bored, Id rate this server 10/10, PLEASE COME AND TRY US [size=18pt][/size]

I think Goudont would like that too, I’m giving hime credits whenever I would quit and release this, but didn’t planned it for this moment so aint releasing anything for now.

Very good job , best one imo.

item.title: Heavenly-Reborn! 562 Loading 688 ! 24/7 Online! Great features!
item.dc:creator: @armani00100 armani00100
item.description:
@armani00100 wrote:

Welcome to Heavenly-Reborn! 562 loading 688

Links: www.heavenly-reborn.tk

INFO
~ Holiday event (easter)
~ Each level up gives you +5 server points (server points cannot be spent, they’re only for your player rank via ::myrank)
~ Max cape added
~ Completionist cape added
~ Skills go to 126 (now it says 126/126 instead of 126/99)
~ Summoning pet now stays with you if you log out (no more pets disappearing)

  • Now you can’t pick up other people’s pets

~ Rune essence mine, and teleport
~ Quick firemaking cube (click on it, and it takes all your logs and converts them to experience)

  • Different logs have different experience

~ New bows available from the vote shop (fastest bows in game)
~ New boss, ‘Grecoloco’ about 1,600 hit points, different types of attacks
~ Fixed some experience rates
~ Barrows fixed (no more glitched rewards, and you can access the chest after you kill all brothers)
~ Primal weapons (all) animations fixed, no longer punches
~ Chaotic Rapier animation fixed
~ x10 hits fixed
~ Slayer minigame
~ Beacon shop (actual shop now, click the chest beside the beacon to spend your points)

~ Made ::myrank command now give you a title depending on your rank
~ Made main dialogues not skip into other dialogues
~Time Counter, now instead of game seconds, it tells you how many hours, minutes, days… etc. That you’ve played.
~ ::bank command for anyone above 1,200 total level (or any level if you’re member)

~ Nice welcome screen
~ Play time, you play for a certain amount of time (10 hours) in total, you can buy a veteran cape by talking to “Skrillaphat” at home.
~ Max cape added
~ Completionist cape added
~ Yell titles change depending on your total level

~ ::afk command now works, you stay fully afk until you type ::back (admins have their chair change every 10 seconds )
~ Dicing added
~ You can buy member points from the member shop (5 points for 50m, 50 points for 500m)
~ Members have exp boosts (depending on their rank, more explained in the [Membership] section)

~ Skillcape masters to give capes
~ Loadstone network

~ Made new tutorial island (prison break)
~ Hint arrows added
~ Tutorial island now has hint arrows that tell you where to go
~ New food in game; ‘Cheeze burger 100%’ heals 70 (x10; 700) health.

~ New bone in game, ‘Greco’s bones’ burry it for 100,000 prayer experience, only obtainable from ‘Grecoloco’ boss

~ Dungeoneering ring no longer allows you to teleport if you’re tele blocked

~ Some admin commands fixed
~ Made greco drop torva at a low rate
~ Made greco drop clue scrolls
~ Players can’t cheat wear
1000
the member items
[Minigames]

  • (Beacon minigame, credits to UnitedPK 525(Kennelz’s server) for the idea)

    • All logs work
    • Point shop made, instead of it automatically giving you
    • Click the beacon in edgeville to learn how the game works

  • (Slayer minigame)

    • 2 floors
    • Prestige Experience multiplier fixed
    • Removed the timer floor due to bugs

  • (Barrows)

    • Kill those crackers in purple for rewards.
    • Rewards fixed

  • (Garden minigame)

    • No more glitching the plant from outside the gate
    • Collect seeds and spend em on the fountain shop for great experience in farming
    • 4 areas, all working and depend on level to work
    • The higher the level, the better the seed

Regular Training Spot

Fully working Completionist Cape!

MeoMPpt.jpg?11086×726

New System, ::myrank !

Slayer system!
bwtYERS.png?1634×636

Staffzone!
GZUMNiz.png?11570×837

Read full topic
